name: RLX Technology Inc.
description: RLX Technology Inc. is a leading player in the e-vapor industry, focusing on the development, manufacturing, and sales of innovative vaping products. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Beijing, China, RLX is committed to providing high-quality alternatives to traditional tobacco products. The company specializes in nicotine delivery systems, including disposable devices and refillable e-vapor products, which are designed to meet the diverse preferences of adult consumers. RLX uses advanced technology and rigorous quality control measures to ensure that its products adhere to strict safety standards while delivering satisfying experiences. The company has rapidly gained market share in the Chinese vaping sector, thanks to its strong brand recognition and extensive distribution network. RLX's mission is to promote a smoke-free lifestyle by offering enjoyable and innovative vaping options, while also contributing to the reduction of tobacco-related harm. As the vaping market continues to evolve, RLX is dedicated to expanding its product portfolio and enhancing consumer engagement through research and development initiatives.
